address: Xã Đồng Quế, Huyện Sông Lô, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc
thought:
**Analyzing the Address Transformation: Xã Đồng Quế in Phú Thọ**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address "Xã Đồng Quế, Huyện Sông Lô, Tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc" and I need to figure out its current administrative unit.  Given my expertise in this, the approach is straightforward.  First, I'll need to figure out if there were any provincial reorganizations. My first step is to quickly determine that Vĩnh Phúc was merged with Phú Thọ.  That's easy.

Now, focusing on the core of the problem, I zero in on "Xã Đồng Quế." Given that Phú Thọ is now the relevant province, I immediately search the available resolutions for changes involving that specific xã, focusing on documents detailing administrative changes within Phú Thọ. I've got a relevant resolution (1676/NQ-UBTVQH15) that pops up.

I immediately scan the resolution. The line in focus is line 58. It clearly states the merging of *Xã Đồng Quế* with other entities, leading to the creation of **Xã Tam Sơn**. No other line seems relevant to "Xã Đồng Quế".

I note a couple of other things that happen. One of the newly created ward "Xã Sông Lô", while it is also in the same district, is *not* related to the merging of "Xã Đồng Quế". Later, I see that the new Xã Sông Lô will be merged later to become the new phường Thanh Miếu.

To verify my initial finding, I double-check the "New wards" data, which confirms the existence of "Xã Tam Sơn" in Phú Thọ. So, while I have some peripheral information, the most direct mapping is the most relevant. The direct and explicit link from the resolution, namely that "Xã Đồng Quế" is merged into "Xã Tam Sơn", makes the identification definitive.

citation.header: 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ
citation.line: 58. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Tân Lập (huyện Sông Lô), xã Đồng Quế và thị trấn Tam Sơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Tam Sơn.
